import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { MdFingerprint } from 'react-icons/md' import { FaBars, FaTimes} from 'react-icons/fa' import { Button } from './Button' import './' function NavBar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const [button, setButton] = useState(true) const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(!click); const showButton = () => { if(window.innerWidth <= 960){ setButton(false) } else { setButton(true) } } window.addEventListener('resize', showButton); return ( <>
< MdFingerprint className='navbar-icon' /> Yesmora
{click ? : }
  • Home
  • Services
  • Products
  • {button ? ( ) : ( )}
); } export default NavBar
